snippet: ANTI-SLAVERY MOVEMENT.--An association is in course of formation in Ohio, called the "Free Territory League," whose object is to establish and support anti-slavery newspapers in the capitals of New-Mexico and California, to publish and circulate i...
lead_paragraph: ANTI-SLAVERY MOVEMENT.--An association is in course of formation in Ohio, called the "Free Territory League," whose object is to establish and support anti-slavery newspapers in the capitals of New-Mexico and California, to publish and circulate in the English and Spanish languages anti-slavery books in those countries, and "to despatch to Santa Fe the most eminent counsel, learned and skill full in the law, and if possible,
